page.title: 03Corston Ch.of All Saints 1
page.content: { {The village church}is just off the main road and is always locked except on Sundays.This is because of possible vandals and robbers.We had to get the key, which is huge and ancient,from {Mrs Dolman}who lives opposite.The Church is quite small and does not even have it's own vicar.There is one service every Sunday,but this is taken by the vicar of Great Somerford,Rev. Guy Oswald.We looked up in his book how many people went to services.The average for an ordinary Sunday was about 15,but there were{26 at Easter, {36 on Christmas Eve}and{68 at the {carol service.}The church looks very well cared for,with some lovely flowers by the pulpit.
